item.title: #TIL 2018-04-10 : til, sysadmin, networking, trick, messaging
item.description: SYSADMIN Create tiny chat channel via netcat In a network, you can create a tiny chatting channel using netcat. It’s lightweight TCP protocol with plain-text transmission, so be carefully on using. First, create a channel by picking port number (ex: 7777) $ sudo nc -l 0.0.0.0 7777 Then, tell you friend your IP and channel port. He will use this info to connect the channel $ nc 192.168.1.2 7777 Finnally, start chatting !
